title: Tokenised crypto events (ICWT)
description: We came to the conclusion that most of the events related to crypto are very costly and highly overvalued.
solution: We want to create a platform where people can vote for all the functions of the events. Event location, the dates and entrance price.
experience: We are a group of event organisers and programmers from the EU that already created a couple of crypto meet-ups. (before COVID)
